title: Dancing on the Head of a Pin
description: This edition is no longer available.Angel Malak knows he owes demon Cael a debt of gratitude for saving his life at least a millennium ago. He's starting to crack under the pressure of Cael's flirting, which is good, Because the Cael's deadline to stay out of Hell is coming up fast. Still, Malak's not sure he wants to share his soul by sleeping with the most beautiful demon he knows. When Cael's old boss shows up to remind him just what's waiting for him back in Hell, Asmodai's gloats a little too much, and tells Cael the end of days might be coming up a little earlier than planned. Can Cael and Malak find a way to keep Cael on earth and stop the impeding apocalypse?
author: Kiernan Kelly
